definition: gained or earned without cheating or stealing
details:
adjective
- gained or earned without cheating or stealing
= example: gained or earned without cheating or stealing
= synonyms: fair
- not forged
= synonyms: good
- not disposed to cheat or defraud
= synonyms: honorable
- marked by truth
= example: marked by truth
- without pretensions
= example: without pretensions
- without dissimulation
- worthy of being depended on
= synonyms: reliable
